channel.title: [317] Fishing Bug [317] Delta
channel.description:
Hey guys i have a fishing bug and it's pretty bad, sometimes when people leave the fishing spot and stop walking further away from it they still continue to do the animation of fishing and they do get fish still. How can I make it so when they walk away fishing stops totally
Thanks
